price: 129. S’il n’y avait eu un arrêt déjà décrété de ton Seigneur, et un terme déjà nommé, (leur supplice) eût été (immédiat).
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musamman
